explains: adj. 空气动力学的，[航] 航空动力学的
wordGroup: aerodynamic characteristics 气动特性；空气动力特性；风轮空气动力特性
aerodynamic drag 空气动力阻力
aerodynamic load 气动载荷；空气动力载荷

sentences.en: This is not surprising because the design of any flying vertebrate is subject to aerodynamic constraints.
sentences.cn: 这并不奇怪，因为任何会飞的脊椎动物的设计都受到空气动力学的限制。

sentences.en: The secret of the machine lies in the aerodynamic shape of the one-piece, carbon-fibre frame.
sentences.cn: 该机器的秘密在于其一体式碳纤维外壳的流线型设计。

sentences.en: There is not much that the turtle can do about this without compromising the aerodynamic shape of the flipper.
sentences.cn: "如果海龟没有符合流体动力学结构的鳍的话，他们也不能解决这个问题。
